p: We further observed that the Ae. aegypti population in Mombasa was not significantly more anthropophilic than that from Nairobi, suggesting that lower Ae. aegypti density and lower temperatures in Nairobi ( Table 1 and Table 2), rather than mosquito feeding pattern, explained the absence of dengue from this city. To fully understand the Ae. aegypti feeding pattern, additional studies incorporating larger sample sizes are required.
